subject: [sugar] GSoC new developer
body:
Hi, i'm Ignacio Vergara new GSoC developer.My project is about distributed electronic voting system. More details are here http://wiki.laptop.org/go/Stirme
I'm looking for any comments, suggestions, recomendations and critics about it. Also i want to know about the status of the mesh activities API to work over it.Thanks in advance.-- Nolambar von Lómeanor
http://nolambar.blogspot.com <- mi blog
